p: The total chlorophyll content in seedlings of ‘Rowa‘ and ‘Krakowianka‘ was significantly lower in each treatment, compared to the control sample. The lowest concentration of chlorophyll was demonstrated for seedlings of the ‘Rowa’ and ‘Półdługa’ cultivars, watered with macerate. For the ‘Półdługa‘ cultivar, no differences in the chlorophyll content were found between the seedlings grown on the infusion and distilled water ( Figure 2).
